translate

Class CINetToSMVTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • translate.CINetToSMVTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreferenceInputTranslator

    public class CINetToSMVTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreferenceInputTranslator
    Translates CI-nets specified in text format into SMV model suitable as input for model checkers Cadence SMV and NuSMV. Based on the chosen model checker (according to value set in the constant Constants.CURRENT_MODEL_CHECKER), the output file format differs. Translation is based on the theory from the paper "Dominance Testing via Model Checking" Santhanam et al. AAAI 2010 which contains the precise translation rules.
    Author:
    gsanthan
    See Also:
    translate.PreferenceInputTranslator#convertToSMV(java.lang.String, int, boolean)

      • convertToSMV

        public java.lang.String convertToSMV(java.lang.String cinetFile,
                            int sampleSize)
                              throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                     org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Translates CI-nets specified in text format into SMV model suitable as input for model checkers Cadence SMV and NuSMV. Also generates random 'sampleSize' specs, i.e., dominance test cases and saves them in a separate '.spec' file. Note: Output file syntax is switched according to value set in the constant Constants.CURRENT_MODEL_CHECKER
        Specified by:
        convertToSMV in interface PreferenceInputTranslator

        Throws:
